body.name: Netac 500GB Portable SSD with RGB LED lighting USB 3.2 Gen 2 (10 Gbps, Type-C) External Solid State Drive Backup Slim Drive for File Storage/Business Travel Essential, Rapid Read & Write Low Noise, ZR
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 14. Order within 3 hrs 4 mins
Or fastest pickup Thursday, February 15. Order within 15 hrs 4 mins
features: 【Gaming Portable SSD】Netac ZR 500GB Portable SSD provide file transfer at speeds up to 550 MB/s read and 450 MB/s write ultra speed, equipped USB 3.2 Gen 2 interface.
【Vibrant RGB LEDs】The ZR external SSD improves your gameplay by using colorful lights that make the gaming experience more exciting and lively. It also adds some color to your gaming setup.
【Plug and Play】The 500GB Portable Solid State Drive Compatible for Windows/Mac/Android. Easy-to-use and can be used in various ways.
【What You Get】Ideal for transferring large-sized data, high-resolution photos, games and more. 3-year worry-free warranty, and friendly customer service are included.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Surprised how good this is.
reviews.reviewText: Usually hard drives this capable are twice the money. Love this little thing. Using it with Apple Sonoma. I have it partitioned for one half Time Machine the other extra storage for large files.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Fast until it's not.
reviews.reviewText: The Netac 250GB Portable SSD with RGB LED Lighting is a tech enthusiast’s dream come true. It’s like a disco ball and a hard drive had a baby. With speeds up to 550MB/s, it’s faster than a cheetah on roller skates. However, it does drop dramatically in speed to 70MB/s after about 80GB written. The USB 3.2 Gen 2 interface ensures that your data transfers are as smooth as a jazz saxophone solo.The slim design makes it perfect for business travel, fitting into your pocket easier than a magician’s card trick. It’s so quiet, you’ll wonder if it’s taken a vow of silence. But don’t be fooled, this little SSD is working hard, backing up your files like a diligent librarian.In conclusion, the Netac 250GB Portable SSD with RGB LED Lighting is the life of the party in the world of storage solutions. It’s not just an SSD, it’s an SSD with pizzazz!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great; looks cool.
reviews.reviewText: I know this external hardrive is all sleek and flashy and meant for gamers, but I’ve been using it to backup my MacBook. It’s been working perfect for that, and I really love the small, convenient size of it. It comes with a nice little leather (or fake leather -I’m not sure) case that seems pretty protective. I actually use the case to cover the hardrive up with Lee using it when I don’t want to be distracted by the flashing lights. It works for that, too. My teenage son, who is a gamer, ly likes the look of it and wants one for himself. It would fit right in with his keyboard with colored backlighting and other various computer parts and accessories with colored chasing lights.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Good, just not for routers
reviews.reviewText: Bought this to use for network attached storage on my router and the router does not detect the drive at all. Detected and works great on a PC.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It gets the job done. I love the rgb lighting, and free leather sleeve case that it comes with. However, I most likely will not be using the leather case because it defeats the rgb lighting which is the sole purpose to purchasing this product. The speed of transferring/managing files to & from will more than just suffice due to the type c connectivity. If it weren't for the rgb lighting, this would be as basic as it gets to accomplishing storage tasks. Nonetheless, I'd recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great portable SSD
reviews.reviewText: I use this as my daily driver between my office and home desk for work as I have a lot of stuff I have to use on both systems. The size of this SSD is very little but because of its metal casing feels very durable and I know it is fine going with me every day. The USB-C gives you super fast transfer speeds and the RGB lighting actually looks nice for the first time ever and even changes when file transfers are taking place so you know something is going on.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this SSD for storing work data off my laptop in case of an unexpected job termination. The product worked well and was very small. It included a leather pouch to contain the device and prevent the USB-C port from getting clogged when you leave it in your work backpack. The SSD enclosure looks very nice and it is very light weight. My favorite thing about the product is the small form factor which makes it easy to carry every day in case I have some free time to back-up my machine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works good, kind of gimmicky
reviews.reviewText: I like the design of it, but it can feel a little gimmicky. Read/write speeds are pretty rough compared to on-board SSDs, but I guess that's a trade-off I'm okay with given the portability of it.
